alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 08 at 5:25AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, near Antler River. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 520 AM AKDT, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - For Antler River near Auke Bay: At 2:45am the stage was 33.82 feet. Flood Stage is 33.5 feet. Forecast: River is cresting early Sunday morning. River levels will decrease through the morning.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
